aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I'm Jesús Pérez, a passionate software developer who loves solving complex problems with creative solutions. I started my journey in programming some years ago, and it has been a path filled with constant learning and improvement. I specialize in frontend development, where I focus on creating user-friendly interfaces, and in backend development, where I work on the essential parts that keep applications and websites running smoothly.

items.title: Git Version Control
items.description: Enhance workflow efficiency with advanced and collaborative version control using Git.
items.fullDescription: Git version control is essential for modern software development. I offer expertise in implementing and managing Git workflows, ensuring smooth collaboration and efficient code management for your projects.
benefits: Better code quality through review processes
Easy tracking of project history and changes

items.title: App Design
items.description: Intuitive, user-centered app designs with sleek interfaces and optimized user experiences.
items.fullDescription: I create app designs that not only look great but also provide an intuitive and engaging user experience. My approach focuses on understanding user needs and translating them into functional, aesthetically pleasing designs.
benefits: Reduced development time through clear design specifications

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Modern web development to create dynamic, responsive, and performance-oriented sites.
items.fullDescription: I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites that not only look great but also perform exceptionally well. Using the latest web technologies and best practices, I ensure your web presence is both impactful and efficient.
benefits: Improved user engagement and conversion rates

items.title: Backend Development
items.description: Robust and scalable back-end solutions powering the logic and data management of your applications.
items.fullDescription: I develop robust and scalable backend solutions that form the foundation of your applications. From API design to database management, I ensure your backend can handle growth and maintain performance under load.
benefits: Easy integration with front-end and third-party services

items.title: Photography
items.description: Professional photography services that capture your brand's essence and enhance visual storytelling.
items.fullDescription: I offer professional photography services that go beyond just taking pictures. My goal is to capture the essence of your brand or project, creating visual narratives that engage and inspire your audience.
benefits: Increased engagement on social media and websites
Professional documentation of events and milestones

items.title: Freelancing
items.description: Flexible and adaptable development and design services to take your projects to the next level.
items.fullDescription: As a freelancer, I offer a wide range of development and design services tailored to your specific needs. My flexible approach allows me to adapt to various project requirements and deliver high-quality results.
benefits: Cost-effective solutions for businesses of all sizes
Access to diverse skill sets and expertise
Direct communication and quick turnaround times

BeerHub.title: BeerHub
BeerHub.description: "BeerHub" is a global platform designed for beer enthusiasts to discover, rate, and favorite beers from around the world. Currently in early access, the platform starts with 10 brands from Spain and Portugal, with new countries and regions added weekly.

Lucky.title: Lucky
Lucky.description: "Lucky" is an app for adopting animals. In this app, both users who wish to adopt a pet and animal shelters can register to showcase the animals available for adoption. This way, users can choose the pet that suits them best. The app has been developed using React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

Beats - Landing Page.title: Beats
Beats - Landing Page.description: "Beats - Landing Page" is a small personal project where I`ve created a replica of BEATS`s landing page using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

GameStore.title: GameStore
GameStore.description: "GameStore" is a small video game shop where users can enter, register, and "purchase" games. They can explore top-rated games and filter them by price. It's built using JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

BMW - Landing Page.title: BMW
BMW - Landing Page.description: "BMW - Landing Page" is an academic project where I've created a replica of BMW's landing page using HTML and SASS.

Slack - Landing Page.title: Slack
Slack - Landing Page.description: "Slack - Landing Page" is an academic project where I've created a replica of Slack's landing page using HTML and CSS.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description:
Hello!

It's great to see you here! I'm always ready for a good chat. If you have any questions, ideas, or just want to say hello, feel free to do so!

You can write to me directly at my email jesusperez_14@hotmail.com and I'll be happy to get back to you as soon as possible.

You can also find me on social media.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
